data.name: Army Gals - The Poker Game
data.detailed_description:
The first Army Gals DLC is set several months after the 'Harem' good ending to the game.

As the four of you get together again after the unfortunate events to play a game of poker. That is until Raen suggests 'like she does' that maybe you should play like they did back in the woods... Simply put betting clothes instead of coin.

Features a selection of brand new CG scenes as well as dialogue as the gals gamble and undress whilst playing poker.
data.about_the_game:
The first Army Gals DLC is set several months after the 'Harem' good ending to the game.

As the four of you get together again after the unfortunate events to play a game of poker. That is until Raen suggests 'like she does' that maybe you should play like they did back in the woods... Simply put betting clothes instead of coin.

Features a selection of brand new CG scenes as well as dialogue as the gals gamble and undress whilst playing poker.
data.short_description: The first story DLC for Army Gals... Can you beat the three girls at poker and reveal the gals a little more intimately.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
